materials: Computer Monitors; Computer (Recycling); Electronics; Telephones; MP3 Players; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
We have been recycling electronics responsibly since 1994.  What we cannot refurbish and resell, we take apart and recycle with certified recyclers.

There is a fee for small quantaties, although we purchase newer equipment, often resulting in us writing a check for corporate accounts.

name: Batteries Plus
materials: Compact Fluorescent Lights; Batteries (Rechargeable); Alkaline/Single-Use Batteries; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Some fees for battery recycling may apply. Please contact your Local store for details.

Batteries Plus lead by example by recycling the majority of the batteries we sell. Not only do we recycle to protect our environment, we support retail and business customers alike by keeping them in full compliance with federal, state, municipal, EPA and DOT regulations governing the disposal and recycling of spent batteries and select electronics.
